Round
===
> Round a numeric value to the nearest integer.


<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var round = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special/round' );
```

#### round( x )

Rounds a `numeric` value to the nearest `integer`.

``` javascript
var val = round( -4.2 );
// returns -4

val = round( -4.5 );
// returns -4

val = round( -4.6 );
// returns -5

val = round( 9.99999 );
// returns 10

val = round( 9.5 );
// returns 10

val = round( 9.2 );
// returns 9

val = round( 0 );
// returns 0
```
<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var round = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special/round' );

var x;
var i;

for ( i = 0; i < 100; i++ ) {
	x = Math.random()*100 - 50;
	console.log( 'Value: %d. Rounded: %d.', x, round( x ) );
}
```
<!-- </examples> -->
